declarations.description:
A flexible box component for use as a flex item within le-stack.

`le-box` wraps content and provides flex item properties like grow, shrink,
basis, and self-alignment. It can also control its internal content alignment.
declarations.name: LeBox

slots.description: Default slot for box content

members.name: grow
members.description: Flex grow factor - how much the item should grow relative to siblings

members.name: shrink
members.description: Flex shrink factor - how much the item should shrink relative to siblings

members.name: basis
members.description: Flex basis - initial size before growing/shrinking (e.g., '200px', '25%', 'auto')

members.name: width
members.description: Width of the box (CSS value like '100px', '50%', 'auto')

members.name: height
members.description: Height of the box (CSS value)

members.name: minWidth
members.description: Minimum width constraint

members.name: maxWidth
members.description: Maximum width constraint

members.name: minHeight
members.description: Minimum height constraint

members.name: maxHeight
members.description: Maximum height constraint

members.name: background
members.description: Background color or CSS value (e.g., '#f0f0f0', 'var(--le-color-primary-light)')

members.name: borderRadius
members.description: Border radius (e.g., '8px', 'var(--le-radius-md)')

members.name: border
members.description: Border style (e.g., '1px solid #ccc', '2px dashed var(--le-color-border)')

members.name: alignSelf
members.description: Self-alignment override for this item on the cross axis

members.name: alignContent
members.description: Internal horizontal alignment of content

members.name: justifyContent
members.description: Internal vertical alignment of content

members.name: padding
members.description: Padding inside the box (CSS value like '8px', '1rem')

members.name: order
members.description: Order in the flex container (lower values come first)

members.name: displayFlex
members.description: Whether to display box content as flex (for internal alignment)

members.name: innerDirection
members.description: Direction of internal flex layout when displayFlex is true

members.name: innerGap
members.description: Gap between internal flex items when displayFlex is true

attributes.name: shrink
attributes.description: Flex shrink factor - how much the item should shrink relative to siblings

declarations.description: A flexible button component with multiple variants and states.

members.name: href
members.description: Optional href to make the button act as a link

declarations.description:
A flexible card component with header, content, and footer slots.

The card uses le-slot wrappers for each slot area. In admin mode,
le-slot shows placeholders for CMS editing. In default mode,
le-slot acts as a transparent passthrough.
declarations.name: LeCard

slots.description: Card header content (title, actions)
slots.name: header

slots.description: Default slot for main card content
Card footer content (buttons, links)
slots.name: footer

members.name: variant
members.description: Card variant style

members.name: interactive
members.description: Whether the card is interactive (clickable)

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Card variant style

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: Whether the card is interactive (clickable)

declarations.description:
Component wrapper for admin mode editing.

This component is used internally by other components to provide admin-mode
editing capabilities. It wraps the component's rendered output and shows
a settings popover for editing properties.

In default mode, it acts as a simple passthrough (display: contents).
In admin mode, it shows a border, component name header, and settings popover.

The host element is found automatically by traversing up through the shadow DOM.

Usage inside a component's render method:
```tsx
render() {
  return (
    <le-component component="le-card">
      <Host>...</Host>
    </le-component>
  );
}
```
declarations.name: LeComponent

slots.description: The component's rendered content

members.name: component
members.description:
The tag name of the component (e.g., 'le-card').
Used to look up property metadata and display the component name.

members.name: displayName
members.description:
Optional display name for the component.
If not provided, the tag name will be formatted as the display name.

members.name: hostClass
members.description:
Classes to apply to the host element.
Allows parent components to pass their styling classes.

members.name: hostStyle
members.description:
Inline styles to apply to the host element.
Allows parent components to pass dynamic styles (e.g., flex properties).

members.name: hostElement
members.description: Reference to the host element (found automatically from parent)

members.name: adminMode
members.description: Internal state to track admin mode

members.name: componentMeta
members.description: Component metadata loaded from Custom Elements Manifest

members.name: propertyValues
members.description: Current property values of the host component

members.name: findHostElement
members.description: Find the host element by traversing up through shadow DOM

members.name: formatDisplayName
members.description:
Formats a tag name into a display name
e.g., 'le-card' -> 'Card'

members.name: loadComponentMetadata
members.description: Load component metadata from the Custom Elements Manifest

members.name: isInternalAttribute
members.description: Check if an attribute is internal (should not be shown in editor)

members.name: readPropertyValues
members.description: Read current property values from the host element

members.name: parseAttributeValue
members.description: Parse an attribute value based on its type

members.name: handlePropertyChange
members.description: Handle property value changes from the editor

members.name: deleteComponent
members.description: Delete this component from the DOM

members.name: renderPropertyEditor
members.description: Render the property editor form

members.name: renderPropertyField
members.description: Render a single property field based on its type

attributes.name: component
attributes.description:
The tag name of the component (e.g., 'le-card').
Used to look up property metadata and display the component name.

attributes.name: display-name
attributes.description:
Optional display name for the component.
If not provided, the tag name will be formatted as the display name.

attributes.name: host-class
attributes.description:
Classes to apply to the host element.
Allows parent components to pass their styling classes.

attributes.name: host-style
attributes.description:
Inline styles to apply to the host element.
Allows parent components to pass dynamic styles (e.g., flex properties).

declarations.description:
Internal dropdown base component that provides shared functionality
for select, combobox, and multiselect components.

Wraps le-popover for positioning and provides:
- Option list rendering with groups
- Keyboard navigation (↑↓, Enter, Escape, Home/End)
- Option filtering support
- Single and multi-select modes
declarations.name: LeDropdownBase

slots.description: The element that triggers the dropdown
slots.name: trigger

members.name: options
members.description: The options to display in the dropdown.

members.name: value
members.description: Current value(s) - single value or array for multiselect.

members.name: multiple
members.description: Whether multiple selection is allowed.

members.name: open
members.description: Whether the dropdown is open.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the dropdown is disabled.

members.name: filterFn
members.description:
Filter function for options.
Return true to include the option.

members.name: filterQuery
members.description: Current filter query string.

members.name: emptyText
members.description: Placeholder text when no options match filter.

members.name: showCheckboxes
members.description: Whether to show checkboxes for multiselect mode.

members.name: maxHeight
members.description: Maximum height of the dropdown list.

members.name: width
members.description: Width of the dropdown. If not set, matches trigger width.

members.name: fullWidth
members.description: Sets the dropdown to full width of the trigger.

members.name: closeOnClickOutside
members.description:
Whether to close the dropdown when clicking outside.
(used to support combobox with input focus)

members.name: show
members.description: Opens the dropdown.

members.name: hide
members.description: Closes the dropdown.

members.name: toggle
members.description: Toggles the dropdown.

attributes.description: Whether multiple selection is allowed.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the dropdown is disabled.

attributes.description: Whether to show checkboxes for multiselect mode.

declarations.description:
A popover component for displaying floating content.

Uses the native HTML Popover API for proper layering with dialogs
and other top-layer elements. Falls back gracefully in older browsers.
declarations.name: LePopover

Element that triggers the popover (optional)

members.name: closeOnClickOutside

declarations.description:
A flexible popup/dialog component for alerts, confirms, prompts, and custom content.

Uses the native HTML <dialog> element for proper modal behavior, accessibility,
and focus management. Can be used declaratively in HTML or programmatically 
via leAlert(), leConfirm(), lePrompt().
declarations.name: LePopup

slots.description: Default slot for custom body content
Custom header content (replaces title)
slots.name: header

slots.description: Custom footer content (replaces default buttons)
slots.name: footer

members.name: open
members.description: Whether the popup is currently visible

members.name: type
members.description: Type of popup: alert (OK only), confirm (OK/Cancel), prompt (input + OK/Cancel), custom

members.name: popupTitle
members.description: Optional title for the popup header

members.name: message
members.description: Message text to display (for alert/confirm/prompt types)

members.name: modal
members.description: Whether the popup is modal (blocks interaction with page behind)

members.name: position
members.description: Position of the popup on screen

members.name: confirmText
members.description: Text for the confirm/OK button

members.name: cancelText
members.description: Text for the cancel button

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text for prompt input

members.name: defaultValue
members.description: Default value for prompt input

members.name: closeOnBackdrop
members.description: Whether clicking the backdrop closes the popup (modal only)

members.name: inputValue
members.description: Internal state for prompt input value

members.name: show
members.description: Opens the popup and returns a promise that resolves when closed

members.name: hide
members.description: Closes the popup with a result

members.description:
Returns the viewPath attribute value for the SVG
based on the width of the parent element

members.name: getPath
members.description:
Returns the circular path for the progress stroke
and additional paths in the background

members.name: required

members.name: searchable

members.name: emptyText

members.name: open

declarations.description:
Slot placeholder component for admin/CMS mode.

This component renders a visual placeholder for slots when in admin mode,
allowing CMS systems to show available drop zones for content or inline editing.

In non-admin mode, this component renders nothing and acts as a passthrough.
declarations.name: LeSlot

slots.description: Default slot for placeholder content or drop zone UI

members.name: type
members.description:
The type of slot content.
- `slot`: Default, shows a dropzone for components (default)
- `text`: Shows a single-line text input
- `textarea`: Shows a multi-line text area

members.name: name
members.description:
The name of the slot this placeholder represents.
Should match the slot name in the parent component.

members.name: label
members.description:
Label to display in admin mode.
If not provided, the slot name will be used.

members.name: description
members.description:
Description of what content this slot accepts.
Shown in admin mode to guide content editors.

members.name: allowedComponents
members.description:
Comma-separated list of allowed component tags for this slot.
Used by CMS to filter available components.

members.name: multiple
members.description: Whether multiple components can be dropped in this slot.

members.name: required
members.description: Whether this slot is required to have content.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text for text/textarea inputs in admin mode.

members.name: tag
members.description:
The HTML tag to create when there's no slotted element.
Used with type="text" or type="textarea" to auto-create elements.

members.name: slotStyle
members.description:
CSS styles for the slot dropzone container.
Useful for layouts - e.g., "flex-direction: row" for horizontal stacks.
Only applies in admin mode for type="slot".

members.name: adminMode
members.description: Internal state to track admin mode

members.name: textValue
members.description: Internal state for text input value (synced from slot content)

members.name: isValidHtml
members.description: Whether the current textValue contains valid HTML

members.name: availableComponents
members.description: Available components loaded from Custom Elements Manifest

members.name: pickerOpen
members.description: Whether the component picker popover is open

members.name: slotRef
members.description: Reference to the slot element to access assignedNodes

members.name: slottedElement
members.description: The original slotted element (e.g., <h3 slot="header">)

members.name: isUpdating
members.description: Flag to prevent re-reading content right after we updated it

members.name: readSlottedContent
members.description: Read content from slotted elements via assignedNodes()

members.name: validateHtml
members.description: Validates if a string contains valid HTML

members.name: createSlottedElement
members.description:
Create a new slotted element when none exists.
The element is appended to the host component's light DOM.

members.name: loadAvailableComponents
members.description: Load available components from Custom Elements Manifest

members.name: formatComponentName
members.description:
Format a tag name into a display name
e.g., 'le-card' -> 'Card'

members.name: addComponent
members.description: Add a new component to the slot

members.name: handleSlotChange
members.description: Handle slot change event to re-read content when nodes are assigned

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
The type of slot content.
- `slot`: Default, shows a dropzone for components (default)
- `text`: Shows a single-line text input
- `textarea`: Shows a multi-line text area

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The name of the slot this placeholder represents.
Should match the slot name in the parent component.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
Label to display in admin mode.
If not provided, the slot name will be used.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description:
Description of what content this slot accepts.
Shown in admin mode to guide content editors.

attributes.name: allowed-components
attributes.description:
Comma-separated list of allowed component tags for this slot.
Used by CMS to filter available components.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Whether multiple components can be dropped in this slot.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Whether this slot is required to have content.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder text for text/textarea inputs in admin mode.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description:
The HTML tag to create when there's no slotted element.
Used with type="text" or type="textarea" to auto-create elements.

attributes.name: slot-style
attributes.description:
CSS styles for the slot dropzone container.
Useful for layouts - e.g., "flex-direction: row" for horizontal stacks.
Only applies in admin mode for type="slot".

events.name: leSlotChange

type.text: EventEmitter<{ name: string; value: string; isValid: boolean }>

events.description:
Emitted when text content changes in admin mode.
The event detail contains the new text value and validity.

declarations.description:
A flexible stack layout component using CSS flexbox.

`le-stack` arranges its children in a row (horizontal) or column (vertical)
with configurable spacing, alignment, and wrapping behavior. Perfect for
creating responsive layouts.
declarations.name: LeStack

slots.description: Default slot for stack items (le-box components recommended)

members.name: direction
members.description: Direction of the stack layout

members.name: gap
members.description: Gap between items (CSS value like '8px', '1rem', 'var(--le-space-md)')

members.name: align
members.description: Alignment of items on the cross axis

members.name: justify
members.description: Distribution of items on the main axis

members.name: wrap
members.description: Whether items should wrap to multiple lines

members.name: alignContent
members.description: Alignment of wrapped lines (only applies when wrap is true)

members.name: reverse
members.description: Whether to reverse the order of items

members.name: maxItems
members.description: Maximum number of items allowed in the stack (for CMS validation)

members.name: fullWidth
members.description: Whether the stack should take full width of its container

members.name: fullHeight
members.description: Whether the stack should take full height of its container

members.name: padding
members.description: Padding inside the stack container (CSS value)

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Direction of the stack layout

attributes.name: gap
attributes.description: Gap between items (CSS value like '8px', '1rem', 'var(--le-space-md)')

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Alignment of items on the cross axis

attributes.name: justify
attributes.description: Distribution of items on the main axis

attributes.name: wrap
attributes.description: Whether items should wrap to multiple lines

attributes.name: align-content
attributes.description: Alignment of wrapped lines (only applies when wrap is true)

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: Whether to reverse the order of items

attributes.name: max-items
attributes.description: Maximum number of items allowed in the stack (for CMS validation)

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: Whether the stack should take full width of its container

attributes.name: full-height
attributes.description: Whether the stack should take full height of its container

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Padding inside the stack container (CSS value)

declarations.description: A tag/chip component for displaying labels with optional dismiss functionality.
declarations.name: LeTag

slots.description: Default slot for custom content (overrides label prop)

members.name: label
members.description: The text label to display in the tag.

members.name: mode
members.description: Mode of the popover should be 'default' for internal use

members.name: icon
members.description:
Icon to display before the label.
Can be an emoji, URL, or icon name.

members.name: dismissible
members.description: Whether the tag can be dismissed (shows close button).

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the tag is disabled.

members.name: size
members.description: The size of the tag.

members.name: variant
members.description: The visual variant of the tag.

declarations.description:
A text component with rich text editing capabilities in admin mode.

`le-text` renders semantic text elements (headings, paragraphs, code, quotes)
and provides a Notion-like rich text editor in admin mode with formatting
toolbar for bold, italic, links, and paragraph type selection.
declarations.name: LeText

slots.description: Default slot for text content

members.name: variant
members.description: The semantic variant/type of text element

members.name: align
members.description: Text alignment

members.name: color
members.description: Text color (CSS value or theme token)

members.name: truncate
members.description: Whether the text should truncate with ellipsis

members.name: maxLines
members.description: Maximum number of lines before truncating (requires truncate=true)

members.name: adminMode
members.description: Internal state to track admin mode

members.name: content
members.description: The HTML content being edited

members.name: isFocused
members.description: Whether the editor is focused (shows toolbar)

members.name: selectionState
members.default: { isBold: false, isItalic: false, isUnderline: false, isStrikethrough: false, isLink: false, blockType: 'p', }
members.description: Current selection state for toolbar button highlighting

members.name: editorRef
members.description: Reference to the contenteditable element

members.name: slotRef

members.name: readSlottedContent

members.name: syncContentToSlot

members.name: handleInput

members.name: handleBlur
